title: Timber view ! Jurrien perspective of Wolves win | Video | News
body_text:
We recently mic’d up Jurrien Timber for a Matchday Diary to document his day in our 2-1 win at home to Wolves.
Press play on the video above to enjoy the day from Jurrien’s perspective, including arriving at Emirates Stadium and appearing on Breakdown Live to share updates on his recovery.
He also watches the warm-ups, talks about life in London, enjoys the game from a box with his family, and provides some accurate goalscorer predictions!
